alertLength.tooltip: Specify how long steward alerts should be shown on screen in seconds (Default: 15 Seconds).

indentFocusedDriver.tooltip: Indent the focused driver in the standings widget (Default: False).

qualifyingResultsDisplayTime.tooltip: The amount of seconds before the end of qualifying to display the results on screen (Default: 25 Seconds)

continueToNextSessionTime.tooltip: The amount of seconds before the continuing to the next session after a race has finished. This also affects how long the results screen is shown for (Default: 45 Seconds).
